Name: Clinker
Notes: Extrapolated from EPD for average UK cement. EN 15804 EPD number EPD-MPA-20170159-CAG1-EN

Name: Gypsum
Notes: Source: Oekobaudat - Gypsum stone (CaSO4-Dihydrate); grinded and purified product

Name: Limestone
Notes: Source: Oekobaudat - Crushed stone 0/2; grain size 0/2

Name: Aggregates
Notes: ICE V3.0. Weighted average of aggregates.

Name: GGBS
Notes: EN 15804 EPD, number: MRPI code 20.1.00033.005

Name: Fly ash
Notes: Based upon 2 data points.

Name: Water
Notes: Defra 2018. Water supply only, e.g. excludes water treatment, considering the water ends up in the product.

Name: Admixture
Notes: Average of 6 EPDs, see calcs further below.

Name: MAC
Notes: Minor additional constituents, used in cement. Assumed same impact as gypsum

Name: Cement, OPC
Notes: Modelled with 94% clinker, 5% gypsum, 1% MAC

Name: Limestone fines
Notes: Source: Oekobaudat - Crushed stone 0/2; grain size 0/2

Name: Natural pozzolanic ash
Notes: e.g. volcanic ash. There was no carbon footprint data. However, the production process is comparable to aggregates and sand, being extraction and crushing. Therefore, it was assumed to have the same impact as aggregates.

Name: Lime, Hydrated
Notes: Generally used in mortars. Source EuLa, LCI of European lime production.

Name: Lime, Quicklime
Notes: Generally used in cements. Source EuLa, LCI of European lime production.

Name: Air entrainers
Notes:
Declaration number EPD-EFC-20150086-IAG1-EN

Declaration number EPD-EFC-20150089-IAG1-EN
